name: part_008
file: tmp_【Mini 3D Live】hololive Indonesia Generasi 1 Bernyanyi Bersama #Area15Mini3DLive [oY0HSWOqV0s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: The final part of the song 'Wonderful Rush' performance.
A short musical transition scene where Iofi and Risu take their places on stage.
Performance of the song 'secret base ~Kimi ga Kuretamono~'.

subtitles.original: シャボン弾ける...
subtitles.english: Bubbles bursting...

subtitles.original: 未来をしっかり見て
subtitles.english: Look straight at the future

subtitles.original: フー！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Woo! Hai!

subtitles.original:
secret base 〜君がくれたもの〜
Lyrics・Composition 町田紀彦
subtitles.english:
secret base ~What You Gave Me~
Lyrics/Composition: Norihiko Machida

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり 将来の夢
subtitles.english: The end of summer with you, dreams for the future

subtitles.original: 大きな希望 忘れない
subtitles.english: Big hopes, I won't forget them

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月
subtitles.english: August, ten years from now

subtitles.original: また出会えるのを信じて
subtitles.english: I believe we'll meet again

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を
subtitles.english: Our greatest memories

subtitles.original: 出会いはふとした瞬間 帰り道の交差点で
subtitles.english: Our meeting was a sudden moment, at a crossroad on the way home

subtitles.original: 声をかけてくれたね 「一緒に帰ろう」
subtitles.english: You called out to me, "Let's go home together"

subtitles.original: 僕は照れくさそうに カバンで顔を隠しながら
subtitles.english: Embarrassed, I hid my face behind my bag

subtitles.original: 本当はとてもとても 嬉しかったよ
subtitles.english: But really, I was so, so happy

subtitles.original: あぁ 花火が夜空綺麗に咲いて ちょっと切なく
subtitles.english: Ah, fireworks bloomed beautifully in the night sky, a little bittersweet

subtitles.original: あぁ 風が時間とともに流れる
subtitles.english: Ah, the wind flows along with time

subtitles.original: 嬉しくて 楽しくて 冒険もいろいろしたね
subtitles.english: It was happy and fun, we had all sorts of adventures

subtitles.original: 二人の 秘密の 基地の中
subtitles.english: Inside our secret base

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり 将来の夢
subtitles.english: The end of summer with you, dreams for the future

subtitles.original: 大きな希望 忘れない
subtitles.english: Big hopes, I won't forget them

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月
subtitles.english: August, ten years from now

subtitles.original: また出会えるのを信じて
subtitles.english: I believe we'll meet again

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から 「ありがとう」叫んでいたこと 知っていたよ
subtitles.english: I knew you were shouting "Thank you" from the bottom of your heart until the end

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて 笑顔でさよなら 切ないよね
subtitles.english: Holding back tears, saying goodbye with a smile, it's painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を
subtitles.english: Our greatest memories

subtitles.original: あぁ 夏休みもあと少しで終わっちゃうから
subtitles.english: Ah, because summer vacation is almost over

subtitles.original: あぁ 太陽と月仲良くして
subtitles.english: Ah, the sun and moon get along well

subtitles.original: 楽しくて 寂しくて 喧嘩もいろいろしたね
subtitles.english: It was fun and lonely, we had all sorts of fights

subtitles.original: 二人の 秘密の 基地の中
subtitles.english: Inside our secret base

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から 「ありがとう」叫んでいたこと 知っていたよ
subtitles.english: I knew you were shouting "Thank you" from the bottom of your heart until the end

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて 笑顔でさよなら 切ないよね
subtitles.english: Holding back tears, saying goodbye with a smile, it's painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を
subtitles.english: Our greatest memories

subtitles.original: 突然の 転校で
subtitles.english: Because of a sudden school transfer

subtitles.original: どうしようもなくて
subtitles.english: There was nothing I could do

subtitles.original: 手紙書くよ 電話もするよ 忘れないでね 僕のことを
subtitles.english: I'll write letters, I'll call you, please don't forget me

subtitles.original: いつまでも 二人の 基地の中
subtitles.english: Inside our base forever

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり ずっと話して 夕日を見てから星を眺め
subtitles.english: Talking with you until the end of summer, watching the sunset then the stars

subtitles.original: 君の頬を流れた涙はずっと忘れない
subtitles.english: I'll never forget the tears that flowed down your cheeks

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで大きく手を振ってくれたこと ずっと忘れない
subtitles.english: I'll never forget how you waved your hand so much until the very end

subtitles.original: だからこうして夢の中で ずっと永遠に
subtitles.english: So like this, inside a dream, forever and ever

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり 将来の夢 大きな希望 忘れない
subtitles.english: The end of summer with you, dreams for the future, big hopes, I won't forget them

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月 また出会えるのを信じて
subtitles.english: August, ten years from now, I believe we'll meet again

subtitles.original: 君が最後まで心から 「ありがとう」叫んでいたこと 知っていたよ
subtitles.english: I knew you were shouting "Thank you" from the bottom of your heart until the end

subtitles.original: 涙をこらえて 笑顔でさよなら 切ないよね
subtitles.english: Holding back tears, saying goodbye with a smile, it's painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を
subtitles.english: Our greatest memories

subtitles.original: 最高の思い出を
subtitles.english: Our greatest memories
